Kossev: Obijena crkva kod Štrpca, lopovi odneli novac sa ikona

02 Nov 2019, 13:40

Nepoznate osobe obile su crkvu 40 Sevastijskih mučenika u Drajkovcu kod Štrpca iz koje su ukrali za sada neutvrdjeni novčani iznos, preneo je danas portal Kossev pozivajući se na navode komandira policijske stanice u tom mestu, Dragana Ivanovića. On je za portal rekao da su ulazna vrata crkve obijena u noći izmedju 31. oktobra i 1. novembra. "Osumnjičeni su nakon obijanja ulaznih vrata crkve novac uzeli sa ikona. Nikakva druga šteta nije pričinjena", naveo je komandir policijske stanice u Štrpcu i dodao da je istraga u toku.

Kossev: A shabby church near Strbac, thieves took money from icons

02 Nov 2019, 12:40

Unidentified individuals abducted the church of 40 Sevastian martyrs in Drajkovac near Štrpce, from which they stole an unspecified amount of money, the Kossev portal reported today, citing allegations from Dragan Ivanovic, commander of the police station in the town. He told the portal that the front door of the church was upholstered in the night between October 31 and November 1. "The suspects took money from the icons after the door to the church was broken in. No other damage was done," the police station commander in Strbac said, adding that the investigation was ongoing.
